page.title: 05SHOPPING IN SANDY
page.content: SANDY HAS A WIDE VARIETY OF SHOPS. MOST OF THE SHOPS ARE SMALL, INDIVIDUAL SHOPS ALTHOUGH THERE ARE THREE SUPERMARKETS. A NEW AND VERY LARGE SUPERMARKET IS BEING BUILT ON THE SITE OF THE RED LION PUB OPPOSITE THE MARKET SQUARE. THERE ARE ONLY A FEW SHOPS ON LONDON ROAD AND ST. NEOTS ROAD, MOST OF THEM ARE IN THE HIGH STREET WHICH RUNS FROM THE BEDFORD ROAD ROUNDABOUT UP TO THE STATION. PEOPLE COME FROM MANY AREAS AROUND SANDY TO SHOP AND IT IS QUITE EASY TO PARK YOUR CAR. THERE IS A LARGE CAR PARK BEHIND SOME OF THE SHOPS IN THE HIGH STREET. CARS ARE ALSO ALLOWED TO PARK ON THE MARKET SQUARE WHICH IS NOT NOW USED FOR THE MARKET.
